/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of white and orange, rise majestically, their facades adorned with numerous windows. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. The sidewalks are lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow on the scene.
